titleStmt.title: A sermon made in the cathedrall churche of Saynt Paule at London, the XXVII. day of June, Anno. 1535. by Symon Matthewe
titleStmt.author: Matthew, Simon, d. 1541.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the Cundite, at the signe of Lucrece,
publicationStmt.date: the yere of our lorde. MD. XXXV. the. xxx. day of July. Cum privilegio.] [1535]

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Sermon of Symon Matt.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
